identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a visceral, high-stakes gambling experience that feels like a cyberpunk casino, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Luxury Casino with Cyberpunk Tech.
Emotion First: Every click must feel like a bet. Every win must feel explosive.
Darkness is the Canvas: Use deep blacks to make gold and neon pop.
Mobile First: The thumb is the controller. Bottom nav is king.

usage.h1: font-primary font-bold text-4xl tracking-tighter uppercase text-white drop-shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(255,215,0,0.5)]
usage.caption: font-secondary text-xs text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-widest

buttons.primary: bg-gold-500 text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-gold-400 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(255,215,0,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-gold-500/50 text-gold-500 hover:bg-gold-500/10 hover:border-gold-500 transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm

cards.game_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-white/10 bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-gold-500/50 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-white/5 border-white/10 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 focus:border-gold-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-gold-500/50 rounded-md

navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-obsidian/90 backdrop-blur-xl border-t border-white/10 z-50 flex justify-around items-center h-16

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure gold text is on dark black, not grey. Use white for body text.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors defined in 'colors.tailwind_config_extension'.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that includes the Bottom Navigation for mobile.
4. Use the 'bento_marketing' grid for the Home Dashboard.
5. Apply 'glassmorphism' classes to all Cards and Modals.
6. Use 'Chakra Petch' (via Google Fonts) for all Headings.
8. DO NOT use default Shadcn styles. Override them with the 'components' styles defined here.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts.
Dark Mode Only: Force dark mode classes on the body.
Micro-interactions: Every button must have a hover and active state.
No Gradients on Text: Unless it's a very large headline.
